stimulusHtml: A circular loop of wire is placed in a magnetic field of magnitude B directed out of the page, as shown. The magnitude of the magnetic field is decreased to zero at a steady rate over a period of time. Which of the following correctly describes the current in the wire while the field is changing?
choicesHtml: Momentarily clockwise, then zero for the rest of the time
Momentarily counterclockwise, then zero for the rest of the time
